plugin.name: effectv
plugin.description: effect plugins from the effectv project

element.name: agingtv
element.description: AgingTV adds age to video input using scratches and dust
element.author: Sam Lantinga <slouken@devolution.com>

element.name: dicetv
element.description: 'Dices' the screen up into many small squares
element.author: Wim Taymans <wim.taymans@chello.be>

element.name: revtv
element.description: A video waveform monitor for each line of video processed
element.author: Wim Taymans <wim.taymans@chello.be>

element.name: shagadelictv
element.description: Oh behave, ShagedelicTV makes images shagadelic!
element.author: Wim Taymans <wim.taymans@chello.be>

element.name: vertigotv
element.description: A loopback alpha blending effector with rotating and scaling
element.author: Wim Taymans <wim.taymans@chello.be>

element.name: warptv
element.description: WarpTV does realtime goo'ing of the video input
element.author: Sam Lantinga <slouken@devolution.com>
